pageContext.claim: “Just out that the Obama Administration granted citizenship, during the terrible Iran Deal negotiation, to 2,500 Iranians - including to government officials. How big (and bad) is that?”
pageContext.analysis: This Four Pinocchio claim somehow wound up on Trump's Twitter feed. It comes from a hard-line Iranian cleric who opposed the Iran nuclear deal. There's no evidence whatsoever to back up this claim. The Trump administration hasn't produced any, and Obama administration officials say it's bunk.
